definition: to glue/to paste/to adhere/to stick to
to receive/to answer (the phone)/to meet or welcome sb/to connect/to catch/to join/to extend/to take one's turn on duty/to take over for sb

sentences.english: This Paper analysed the characteristic of alnico adhesion of motorcycle starting motor, introduced the adhesive technique and the selecting of adhesives.
sentences.chinese: 分析了摩托车起动电机磁钢粘接的特点。

sentences.english: As a result, we can obtain a thin and uniform adhesive layer, which can be cohered easily by hot pressure.
sentences.chinese: 它涂布方便，易得薄而匀的胶膜，便于热压粘接使用。

sentences.english: An emphasis on the organic binding technology's application in benchwork is introduced.
sentences.chinese: 重点介绍了有机粘接技术在钳工工作中的应用。

sentences.english: The study provide the technical accumulation for developing of polysulfide sealant and increasinging the bonding capability of polysulfide sealant.
sentences.chinese: 为提高聚硫密封剂的粘接性能提供了技术依据。

sentences.english: To evaluate the effectiveness of self-etching bond system in repair of sphenoid defects.
sentences.chinese: 目的评价自酸蚀粘接修复楔状缺损的效果。

sentences.english: The effect of polyvinyl acetals on its adhesive strength was investigated.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了聚乙烯醇缩醛的粘接强度的影响。

sentences.english: Bonding reliability of electrically conductive adhesives(ECAs)is very important to their application.
sentences.chinese: 导电胶的粘接可靠性是制约其应用的主要影响因素。

sentences.english: Alternatively, a reflective type of adhesive containing aluminium powder may be used .
sentences.chinese: 此外，也可采用含有铝粉的反射型粘接剂。

sentences.english: It provides for more precious time for bonding.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了更多的宝贵时间的粘接。

sentences.english: Application of bonding technique in high-duty ferrite phase shifter was mainly introduced.
sentences.chinese: 主要介绍了粘接技术在高功率铁氧体移相器上的应用。

sentences.english: In this study, effect of cyclic load on the vacuum tightness of the adhesively bonded joint was investigated experimentally.
sentences.chinese: 该文实验研究了循环载荷对粘接接头气密性的影响。

sentences.english: The silane treated carbon steel was adhered by epoxy resin.
sentences.chinese: 对碳钢表面进行硅烷处理，用环氧树脂胶黏剂粘接。

sentences.english: Nowadays, bonding reliability of electrically conductive adhesives(ECAs) has become one of the difficulties in its application.
sentences.chinese: 导电胶的粘接可靠性是制约其应用的主要影响因素。

sentences.english: Selection of the underlying bonding material generally chromium iron-nickel alloy.
sentences.chinese: 粘接底层材料一般选用铬铁镍合金。

sentences.english: I company for professional and special silicone adhesive manufacturers.
sentences.chinese: 我公司为专业硅胶和特殊粘接剂生产厂家。

sentences.english: A sewn upper and outsole means there are no glued seams to come apart.
sentences.chinese: 一个缝大底上就会有不粘接缝来分开。
